thread.title_full: TIME and HSMAI Pacific Partner to Build Hospitality Education and Professional DevelopmentTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: TIME and HSMAI Pacific Partner to Build Hospitality Education and Professional DevelopmentTravelandtourworld.com
text:
TIME and HSMAI Pacific Partner to Build Hospitality Education and Professional Development Published on : Wednesday, September 2, 2015
The Hospitality Sales and Marketing Association International (HSMAI) Pacific and Travel Industry Mentor Experience (TIME) – today announce their partnership to accelerate education and professional development in the hospitality industry.
TIME have successfully built a mentor program in Australia over five years and to date have inducted 100 Mentees and have a register of more than 70 Mentors volunteering their time and valuable expertise to support the future of the travel industry. TIME is continuing to build its relationships in the industry and therefore continuing to enhance the skills and confidence of the next group of industry leaders.
Pacific President, Benjamin Weinmann comments “We are excited about the partnership with TIME. HSMAI have a strong focus on hospitality education and partnering with such a successful program we are confident that through our education and a mentor program we will build the future leaders in the hospitality industry, a common point of conversation at our local events.”
Chair of TIME Penny Spencer said “It is important that TIME continues to develop, encourage and nurture talented individuals who will undoubtedly be the foundation of the travel industry of the future – to achieve this we need industry support.”
Source:- HSMAI
